predicate.note: Frames file for 'materialize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class 48.1.1, no indication of other members. Comparison with 'appear'.

example.name: typical usage
example.text: A spokesman for Temple estimated that Sea Containers' plan -- if all the asset sales materialize -- would result in shareholders receiving only $36 to $45 a share in cash.

example.name: with argM
example.text: ``If a bid materializes at that price, shareholders will have every reason to be glad, but the question of financing still remains.''
